name: The Getaway Driver
description:
[Description]: This is a simple Unity game based on Need for Speed and Burnout, where the objective is to reach the endpoints of the map in a certain amount of time without being taken down by the police.

[Author]: Konstantin Klironomos

[Controls]: 
W, Up - Forward
S,  Down - Reverse
A/D, Left/Right - Turn
Space - Handbrake
H - Headlight Toggle
C - Change Camera
G - Reset Level
F - Neon Toggle
L-Shift - Nitro
E - Toggle Controls
(Only for Tutorial)
